content: This PR would be marked RFC, but we don't have that label. In it I am developing an API that will work for the continuous functional calculus in unital algebras. If you are interested, please have a look and share your thoughts. It's kind of a big undertaking. I've thought a lot about it, but I'm always happy to have improvements.
I've just created that label and added it to your PR #5750.
I also hope to have some comments eventually but probably not for at least a week.
